00016 global $booPage;
00017 ?>
00018 <?php if (!function_exists('dynamic_sidebar') || !dynamic_sidebar()): // widgetized sidebar ?>
00019     <div class="box-wp-sidebar box-wp box clearfix">
00020         <div class="head clearfix">
00021             <h1>Search</h1>
00022         </div>
00023         <div class="body clearfix">
00024             <?php get_search_form(); ?>
00025         </div>
00026     </div>

00028         <div class="head clearfix">
00029             <h1>Archives</h1>
00030         </div>
00031         <div class="body clearfix">
00032             <ul>
00033                 <?php wp_get_archives('type=monthly'); ?>
00034             </ul>
00035         </div>
00036     </div>
00037     <div class="box-wp-sidebar box-wp box clearfix">
00038         <div class="head clearfix">
00039             <h1>Categories</h1>
00040         </div>
00041         <div class="body clearfix">
00042             <ul>
00043                 <?php wp_list_categories('show_count=1&title_li='); ?>
00044             </ul>
00045         </div>
00046     </div>
00047     <div class="box-wp-sidebar box-wp box clearfix">
00048         <div class="head clearfix">
00049             <h1>Meta</h1>
00050         </div>
00051         <div class="body clearfix">
00052             <ul>
00053                 <?php wp_register(); ?>
00054                 <li><?php wp_loginout(); ?></li>
00055                 <li><a href="http://wordpress.org/" title="Powered by WordPress">WordPress</a></li>
00056                 <?php wp_meta(); ?>
00057             </ul>
00058         </div>
00059     </div>
00060 <?php else: ?>
00061     <div class="box-wp-sidebar box-wp box clearfix">
00062         <div class="head clearfix">

00064         </div>

00066             <p>No sidebar found!</p>
00067         </div>
00068     </div>
